snippet: The foreign ministers of South Korea, China and Japan will meet in Seoul, the South Korean capital, for the first time in three years this weekend.
abstract: Talks between foreign ministers of China, South Korea and Japan will resume in Seoul after being suspended in 2012.
lead_paragraph: The foreign ministers of South Korea, China and Japan will meet in Seoul, the South Korean capital, for the first time in three years this weekend.

headline.main: South Korea: Nations to Discuss Disputes
headline.print_headline: Asia; South Korea: Nations to Discuss Disputes
